vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀθετ-έω, ἄθετος
) set at naught a treaty, promise, etc., πίστιν[NT+2nd c.BC+]; deny, disprove, τἀληθές[Refs 5th c.BC+]:—passive, to be struck off a register, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; to be rejected, of a petition, [Refs 4th c.BC+]:—Astrology texts, cancel, render ineffectual, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]
__2 with dative, refuse one's assent, τοῖς ὑπὸ Τιμαίου εἰρημένοις[Refs 2nd c.BC+]
__3 deal treacherously with, break faith with, τινά[NT+2nd c.BC+]
__II Grammars, reject as spurious, [Refs 1st c.BC+]
__III absolutely, to be unsuitable, unfit, [Refs 4th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to reject, set aside
primarily to displace; to abrogate, annul, violate, swerve from; reject, condemn
vocabInfos._es_Definition: rechazar  rehusar, ignorar; hacer inválido, dejar a un lado; quebrantar (1TI.5:12)
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 視為無用,廢除,忽視
2) 棄絕,不認可,不容許
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 视为无用,废除,忽视
2) 弃绝,不认可,不容许
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: từ chối; bác bỏ; khinh miệt, không nhận ra
